Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ensg.jade.semantic.Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObjExport

    public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObjExport
    Building is the class implementing a building from the RGE

        vertices - The vertices of the building

      • toOBJ

        public java.lang.String toOBJ(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indexOffsets,
                              double xOffset,
                              double yOffset)
        Converts a Building into a string corresponding to the .obj description of it
        Specified by:
        toOBJ in interface IObjExport
        Parameters:
        indexOffsets - a list of 3 integers wich correspond to the offset of - vertex index - uv coordinates index - normal coordinates indexs in the file
        xOffset - The Offset along x axis
        yOffset - The Offset along y axis
        Returns:
        A string corresponding to the .obj description of the Building
